scripts.vercel-build: npm i -g npm@7 && ./scripts/website-preview-setup.sh && rm -rf .next && cp -R ./content/ ./website-preview/content && cp -R ./public/img/** ./website-preview/public/img/ && cd ./website-preview && DEV_IO_PROXY=waypoint IS_CONTENT_DEPLOY_PREVIEW=true npm run build && cp -R .next/ ../.next && rm -rf ../public && cp -R public/ ../public
